ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmf.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | nmf.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 3 |  | nmmtri.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 5 | 2, 1, 3, 4 | #P_ngpds | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( dist ` G ) B ) = ( N ` ( A .- B ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ngpms | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. MetSp ) |

| 8 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> B e. X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) |
| 15 | 1, 4 | #P_mstri3 | |- ( ( G e. MetSp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ ( 0g ` G ) e. X ) ) -> ( A ( dist ` G ) B ) <_ ( ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) + ( B ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 8, 9, 14, 15 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( dist ` G ) B ) <_ ( ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) + ( B ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 2, 1, 11, 4 | #P_nmval | |- ( A e. X -> ( N ` A ) = ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 19 | 2, 1, 11, 4 | #P_nmval | |- ( B e. X -> ( N ` B ) = ( B ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` B ) = ( B ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 21 | 18, 20 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) + ( N ` B ) ) = ( ( A ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) + ( B ( dist ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 16, 21 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( dist ` G ) B ) <_ ( ( N ` A ) + ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 5, 22 | #P_eqbrtrrd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A .- B ) ) <_ ( ( N ` A ) + ( N ` B ) ) ) |
